name: Through Body and Mind
description:
Our submission for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2021 Game Jam. By swapping between the physical world and an altered mind world the player solves puzzles and avoids enemies to reach the end. This is our first game jam, and we're proud of what we've made.

Walker Roberts - Programming, animations, art, level design

Eric Aldridge - Programming, level design

Cord Bates - Music, sound effects

All font not default in unity courtesy of "Free Pixel Art Font Pack: 'BlackBold' and 'GreyBold'" pack by Babbage: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/fonts/free-pixel-art-font-pack-blackbol...

All art that's not custom courtesy of the "Pixel Art Top Down - Basic" pack by Cainos: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-top-down-basic-1...
